Package components

Class Fridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
        • components.Fridge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.CyPhyComponentI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.EmbeddingComponentAccessI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentServiceI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, FridgeI, java.rmi.Remote
    public class Fridge
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
implements FridgeI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.EmbeddingComponentAccessI
    The class Fridge implements a fridge component that will hold the fridge simulation model. The fridge is composed of two compartments : the fridge and freezer

    Invariant

     invariant              true
